full_title: OKS Roll-Type Cleaning Cloths, 30-Pack (35cm x 25cm), Pink & White Viscose Rayon Wipes for Floor Cleaner, Bathroom Cleaner, Kitchen Cleaner, and All Purpose Surface Cleaning Supplies

reasoning.keyword_integration: Integrated 'floor cleaner', 'bathroom cleaner', 'kitchen cleaner', 'all purpose', 'surface', and 'cleaning supplies' by framing the cloths as the tool used *for* these high-volume cleaning tasks. The description flows as a natural use-case statement.
